name: eyebrow
content:

B2 the line of short hairs above each eye in humans: pluck your eyebrows Do you pluck your eyebrows (= remove some of the hairs to change their shape)?bushy eyebrows He's got really bushy (= thick) eyebrows.

More examplesFewer examplesHe raised one eyebrow in a meaningful way.He had furry eyebrows and bristly hair cropped short.
